channel.title: Errors while making Crystal Chest... Please help!

item.title: Errors while making Crystal Chest... Please help!
item.dc:creator: @forest419 forest419
item.description:
@forest419 wrote:

[code]public static int CrystalChestPrize[] = {6916, 6918, 6920, 6922, 6924, 6131, 6133, 6135, 6143, 6149, 1038, 1040, 1042};

public static int randomCrystalChestPrize()
{
	return CrystalChestPrize[(int)(Math.random()*CrystalChestPrize.length)];
}[/code]

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Put in item2.java________________________________________

if (UsedOnObjectID == 172 && ItemID == 989) { addItem(Item2.randomCrystalChestPrize(), 1); deleteItem(989, 1); sendMessage("You gain a random prize from the chest!"); }

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Put in Client.java

client.java:9006: <identifier> expected public void ^ Item2.java:339: class, interface, or enum expected public static int CrystalChestPrize[] = {6916, 6918, 6920, 6922, 6924, 6131, 6133, 6135, 61 43, 6149, 1038, 1040, 1042}; ^ Item2.java:341: class, interface, or enum expected public static int randomCrystalChestPrize() ^ Item2.java:344: class, interface, or enum expected }→ ^ 4 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

???

Add my MSN Btforbes27@live.com

Read full topic
